Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class Savings

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Account
com.example.project3.Savings
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoneyMarket
public class Savings extends Account
This class is for a Savings Account that extends the Account class. Calculates monthly interest and fee for a Savings Account. Checks if the customer is loyal or not, and adjusts the interest rates accordingly.
Author:
Minseok Park, Amogh Sarangdhar

  • Constructor Details

    • Savings

      public Savings​(String fname, String lname, String dob, double balance, boolean loyality)
      Parametrized constructor to create a Savings account for GUI program This takes a firstname, lastname, dob, as strings, and balance as double.
      Parameters:
      fname - first name of the holder.
      lname - last name of the holder.
      dob - date of birth of the holder.
      balance - balance in the account of the holder.
      loyality - loyalty of the holder.

    • Savings

      public Savings​(String transaction)
      Parametrized constructor that takes an input String from terminal. Tokenizes the input string and checks if the customer is loyal or not.
      Parameters:
      transaction - transaction string for a savings account.
